Package org.dellroad.dataskin.viewer

Class DataViewer

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.flow.component.Component
com.vaadin.flow.component.applayout.AppLayout
org.dellroad.dataskin.viewer.DataViewer
All Implemented Interfaces:
AttachNotifier, DetachNotifier, HasElement, HasStyle, RouterLayout, Serializable
public class DataViewer extends AppLayout
General purpose data viewer component.

Instances are configured with two sources of information:

  • A HierarchicalDataProvider provides a tree of navigation items as NavTreeNodes. The class BasicNavTree can generate such a tree from a set of Java types by scanning their @DataSkinAction and @DataSkinQuery annotations (static operations only).
  • A DisplayHooks implementation handles the details of displaying configuration dialogs, operation results, etc. The class BasicDisplayHooks serves as a default implementation.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form
